name: Mabsoot Library -  Fully Rigged characters with expressions
description:
• Mabsoot means Happy in Arabic, I designed this original library to be efficient and production ready, as we in MoneyFellows are moving so fast with just handful design team members.
  • The idea of rigging and using the power of figma's components, came out of the need to pose and produce many artworks of people, for the app in the shortest possible time.
  • I used components to be able to change hair styles, hand gestures, face expressions, clothes.
  • Also used the colors styles to give alias color tokens to each of the characters parts to easily be able to change colors independently,


Feel free to remix them and adapt into your own style, and please contact me if you have any question or issues.


Thanks.
